feature.label: Shell to Eclipse Bridge (steb)
feature.description:
Shell to Linux Bridge (steb) allows for easy shell integration with Eclipse. Rather than toil with workspaces and File->Open... drugery, launch an Eclipse editor on the command line as you would vi or emacs. Here is the client side script (also included in the plugin) to execute from the shell:
#!/bin/bash touch $1 realpath $1 | nc localhost 4404
